hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah commanded me to sleep after praying Witr, to perform Ghusl on Friday and to fast three days of each month." (Sahih)

chapter.ara-name: باب صَوْمِ ثَلاَثَةِ أَيَّامٍ مِنَ الشَّهْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Fasting Three Days of The Month
